data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Saint Helier, Jersey to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Helier, Jersey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Saint Helier.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Saint Helier to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 2,016 believers in Saint Helier against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Father, please raise up prophets in Saint Helier who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Saint Helier, Jersey that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Saint Helier, Jersey.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Helier, Jersey has a population of 33,600.

We estimate Saint Helier has 2,016 people who might know Jesus, 16,128 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 15,456 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
